tuv.seg: Briefly describes the education system in Ireland and introduces a series of links to information on primary, secondary and third level education
Tuairisc ghairid atá ann ar chóras oideachais na hÉireann agus tugtar réimse nascanna eolais ar oideachas bunscoile, meánscoile agus oideachas tríú leibhéil
Moving to Ireland for third-level education
Teacht go hÉirinn le freastal ar oideachas tríú leibhéil
Third level educational system in Ireland and the way in which places at universities and colleges are allocated
Tá cur síos anseo ar an gcóras oideachais tríú leibhéil in Éirinn agus an córas le háiteanna a dháileadh
Immigration rules for full-time non-EEA students
Rialacha inimirce do mhic léinn lánaimseartha neamh-LEE
In 2015 and 2016 there have been changes to the immigration rules for non-EEA students who are coming to study in Ireland
I 2015 agus 2016 tá rialacha nua inimirce do mhic léinn neamh-LEE atá ag teacht chun staidéar a dhéanamh in Éirinn
Student visas to study in Ireland
Víosaí do mhic léinn
People from certain countries who wish to study in Ireland require visas
Teastaíonn víosaí ó dhaoine as tíortha áirithe atá ag iarraidh staidéar a dhéanamh in Éirinn
This document is in: Travel and Recreation > Travel to Ireland
This document is in: Taisteal agus Áineas > Taisteal go hÉirinn
Most Read in "Moving Country"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Ag bogadh tíre"
Irish citizenship through birth or descent
Saoránacht d'Éirinn ó bhreith nó ó ghinealach
Visa requirements for entering Ireland
Riachtanais víosa le teacht isteach in Éirinn
Coming to work in Ireland
Ag teacht go hÉirinn chun oibriú
Becoming an Irish citizen
Ag éirí i do shaoránach Éireannach
